text:
Q: Dynamic field search in Spanner DB A:

What is the question you actually want an answer to that you gave all this for that you didn't ask yet?

Q: Is it possible to prefill a input() in Python 3's Command Line Interface? A:

bro just use the prompt_toolkit module:

https://python-prompt-toolkit.readthedocs.io/en/latest/pages/asking_for_input.html#passing-a-default

example:

from prompt_toolkit import prompt
_inp_tag_val_from = prompt("tag change from value> ",default=f"{g.sea_tag_val_from}")

Q: Razor Page is not calling OnPostAsync? A:

Solved. I just send using Ajax Post and it works.

Q: Firebase manual initialization A:

Re-enable the plugins so the Crashlytics tasks are generated:

apply plugin: 'com.google.gms.google-services'
apply plugin: 'com.google.firebase.crashlytics'

Q: Filtering-out URL parameter on HTML page before they are sent to analytics A:

You can remove sensitive URL parameters without reloading the page by using the History API. This updates the URL before analytics scripts read it.

This keeps the page loaded but changes the address bar to:

https://my-web-page.com?code=123

So analytics will receive the cleaned URL.
